## {{plot}}

```{r, results = "asis"}
data <- results_reb$stats_by_contrast[["{{contrast}}"]]
groups <- norm_reb$targets$group
data$sig.FDR <- ifelse(is.na(data$sig.PVal), 0, data$sig.FDR)  
Glimma::glimmaXY(
  x = data$AveExpr,
  y = data$logFC,
        counts = norm_reb$normList[["vsn"]],
        groups = groups,
        transform.counts = "none",
  sample.cols = unname(colorGroup2(groups)[groups]),
        status.cols = c("#00bfff", "#858585", "#ff3030"),
        xlab = "AveExpr",
        ylab = "LogFC",
        status = data$sig.FDR,
        anno = ext_reb$annot[rownames(data), ],
        display.columns = c("UniprotID", "Gene_name"),
        main = " ")
```
